data.eml:eml: Revision of the cirolanid isopod genus Odysseylana Malyutina, 1995 (Crustacea) with description of two new species from Singapore

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Sidabalok, Conni M., Bruce, Niel L. (2015): Revision of the cirolanid isopod genus Odysseylana Malyutina, 1995 (Crustacea) with description of two new species from Singapore. Zootaxa 4021 (2): 351-367, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4021.2.6
